summary:
For mud crab lovers.
Adds a new ingredient \"crab meat\".
descriptionHtml:
Name: Crab Meat -alchemical ingredient OBLIVION style-
Version: 1.0
Date: 4/14/2012
Category: Miscellaneous
Author: AltheaR

Adding recipe and also Japanese translated ver. by suzuki is now available :D
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17166]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17166[/url]
can create salt from mudcrab chitin, and boiled crab! Check it out!

Description
===========
Do you like mud crabs? Are you an alchemist? Did you play TES4?

Location
========
Now, mud crabs have crab meats.
And you can also get them in alchemy shops, inns, and fish&meat stalls.


Details
=======
Mud crabs drop 1~3 crab meats.
Shops sell 1~4 crab meats.
No merchant perk required.
Crab meat effects are almost the same as TES4.
1. Restore Stamina
2. Resist Shock
3. Damage Stamina
4. Resist Fire

Hawk beaks are difficult to get...for a novice archer.
But mud crabs are easy to kill!
Recipe examples:
Snowberry + Crab Meat + Frost Mirriam
Snowberry + Crab Meat + Thistle Branch
Snowberry + Crab Meat + Purple Mountain Flower  (= magesbane...defensive)


Incompatibility
===============
None. I think.
I made some new leveled lists for this.


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Oblivion and Skyrim.
Thanks to skyrim.nexusmods.com
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.


Tools Used
==========
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Creation Kit
Nifskope
Gimp
DirectX Texture Tool


Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that 
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.
I would also like to know what mods are including my work.
author: AltheaR
